issue.title: [R] Allow cookbook to pair build version with release version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13393](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13393). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So we can have an updated version for 5.0.0, 6.0.0, etc

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13393?focusedCommentId=17394328) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Now being managed in the cookbook's GH issues page: https://github.com/apache/arrow-cookbook/issues/10
